description.narrative: IFC anticipates the project will affect a significant number of avocado farmers in Colombia, Chile, Peru, and Mexico, who will benefit from better access to inputs such as avocado cultivars from newly-established or expanded nurseries. The project will also create ~730 new direct jobs in Colombia (nursery and orchards), Chile (nursery and logistics), and Peru (orchards) . In addition, the project is expected to have meaningful impact across a range of market-level dimension, including competitiveness, inclusiveness, and sustainability. The proposed investment will make the South African avocado industry more globally competitive and enhance the country reputation's as a hub for sector expertise and on avocados.

mailing-address.narrative: Westfalia Fruit International Ltd Chantelle Grobler Finance Manager +44 (0) 7711 422452 Chantelle.Grobler@westfaliafruit.com Dartford DA1 2DR United Kingdom http://www.westfaliafruit.com
